positive: Keep a gratitude journal to reflect on the good moments.
Share your positivity with someone today!
Try setting a new goal or challenge for yourself.
neutral: Take a few deep breaths and stretch your body.
Go for a short walk to reset your mind.
Try listening to music or doing a 5-minute mindfulness exercise.
negative: Try grounding techniques like 5-4-3-2-1 to reconnect with the present.
Talk to a trusted friend or write your thoughts in a journal.
Consider practicing box breathing (inhale 4s, hold 4s, exhale 4s, hold 4s).
